attributes.action: Create a duty of truth for politicians and holders of public office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is widespread scepticism about almost every official pronouncement. This is seriously undermining our democracy and rule of law. Everyone can be free to express an opinion, but when issuing a 'fact' that fact needs to be honest and a fair representation of how things really are to the best of their knowledge. Anyone can opt not to answer a question. Knowingly misleading the public is a serious matter, undermines confidence in our democracy and anyone found guilty of this should be barred from office.
